body: This artist has a rather odd fixation on futanari being raped by tentacles. It's it's not futa it's shota, or even worse futa on shota. I think it's fine if that's what they want to be known for but they could at least draw different scenes. It just seems to always be the same futa x tentacle story.  I really wish they would go back to drawing shipgirls with huge tits.
It was all perfect.. why futa..

The arts are great, tho this author really have a big problem with futa in everything and lost interest in watching it. hope he get it fixed soon, sad because some of it would have been good if it wasnt of that fixation...
